- Improvements and bug fixes
- Data consumption improved

- Improvements and bug fixes
- Data consumption improved

- Improvements and bug fixes

- Fix for incorrect images in channel view
- Bug fixes and improvements
- Email us at iphoneapp@mailonline.co.uk with feedback as we can't respond directly to app reviews.

- Fix for incorrect images in channel view
- Bug fixes and improvements
- Email us at iphoneapp@mailonline.co.uk with feedback as we can't respond directly to app reviews.

- Improvements to content download speed
- Optimized cache times so the content is fresher
- Memory improvements for all devices
- Improved caching to reduce app size on your device
- Updated progress bar when syncing content
- Optimized article loading for older devices
- Bug and crash fixes

We listened to all your feedback and hope these changes will help any issues you may have experienced.

Please email us directly at iphoneapp@mailonline.co.uk if you have any issues so we can help. We can't reply to app reviews.

- Improved caching to reduce app size on your device
- Updated progress bar when syncing content
- Optimized article loading for older devices
- Bug and crash fixes

We listened to all your feedback and hope these changes will help any issues you may have experienced.

- Improvements to content download speed
- Optimized cache times so the content is fresher
- Memory improvements for all devices

We listened to all your feedback and hope these changes will help any issues you may have experienced.

- Added Australia Home & Showbiz channels. Go to 'More > Reorder' to move them up your channel menu.

- Fixed a bug which prevented content from refreshing
- You can now to reply to comments
- Bug and crash fixes to make the app faster
- You can now login via Facebook & Google
- You can now share articles via WhatsApp
- Email us directly at iphoneapp@mailonline.co.uk if you have any issues so we can help. We can't reply to app reviews.
